title: Joe's party
creator_credit: TVA Group Production and Holman Brothers
brief_description: Joe is having a party with his family, in a hospital bed, having nearly killed himself in an accident at work. Industrial accidents are invariably caused by failing to exercise care or not observing recognised safety precautions. Shows examples in a stone quarry, but the warnings apply to many industries.
